body:
Hello to anyone that has any interest in my opinion.

I am wondering if there is any software that might be helpful in recording my games as I frequently get banned for nothing and in my case my irl friend has suggested that I start recording my game so that if I get banned again there is no way that they can not unban me. Because I will have proof.

replies.body:
"I frequently get banned for nothing".
I see that you only have one ban. Before going any further I want to make sure that you know that ban evading is not allowed, if that is what you are doing. Just a heads up! ^o^

Anyways, I would recommend Camtasia Studio, or Fraps, because they are both very simple and easy to use. Also, Bandicam may appeal to you, but it can be confusing for some people.
